alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Perry; Saline; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Perry, northwestern Garland, northwestern Saline, south central Yell and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Muddy Creek WMA, or 12 miles northeast of Mount Ida, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Avant... Birta... Carter Cove Park... Chula... Gibbs... Mt Tabor... Fannie... Lena Landing Rec Area... Hamilton... Fourche Junction... Hollis... Onyx... Story... Hurricane Grove... Washita... Garden Point Recreation Area... Nimrod... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central and western Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Garland; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Perry; Saline; Yell Excluding Northwest
